doc:
Shug Fisher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shug_Fisher 0 Shug Fisher (September 26, 1907–March 16, 1984), born George Clinton Fisher Jr., was an American character actor, singer, songwriter, musician and comedian. During a 50-year career, he appeared in many Western films, often as a member of the Sons of the Pioneers in Roy Rogers serials. Fisher also had supporting roles on many TV shows, most frequently on Gunsmoke and The Beverly Hillbillies. His comic trademarks included his ability to stutter at will and his bemused facial expressions. Shug_Fisher ( September_26_,_1907 – March_16_,_1984 ) , born George_Clinton_Fisher_Jr. , was an_American_character_actor , singer , songwriter , musician_and_comedian . During a_50-year_career , he appeared in many_Western_films , often as a_member of the_Sons of the_Pioneers in Roy_Rogers_serials . Fisher also had_supporting roles on many_TV_shows , most_frequently on Gunsmoke and The_Beverly_Hillbillies . His_comic_trademarks included his_ability to stutter at will and his_bemused_facial_expressions .
